flextable package
  • Introduction
  • Header
  • Layout
  • Format
  • Sizing
  • Function reference

flextable theme

apply a theme to a flextable

theme_vanilla(x)

theme_zebra(x, odd_header = "#CFCFCF", odd_body = "#EFEFEF",
  even_header = "transparent", even_body = "transparent")

theme_tron_legacy(x)

theme_tron(x)

Arguments

x
a flextable object
odd_header, odd_body, even_header, even_body
odd/even colors for table header and body

See also

flextable

Examples

# theme_vanilla -------
ft <- flextable(iris)
ft <- theme_tron(ft)
ft

# theme_zebra -------
ft <- flextable(iris)
ft <- theme_zebra(ft)
# theme_tron_legacy -------
ft <- flextable(iris)
ft <- theme_tron_legacy(ft)
# theme_tron -------
ft <- flextable(iris)
ft <- theme_tron(ft)
